body: @stephendonner I never run the contract API tests against a local copy of Normandy -- I always run them on whatever was deployed to staging. Seemed to me to not be a good use of my time to get it running locally.
body_text: @stephendonner I never run the contract API tests against a local copy of Normandy -- I always run them on whatever was deployed to staging. Seemed to me to not be a good use of my time to get it running locally.
